definition: Yangquan prefecture level city in Shanxi 山西
positive (electric.)/sun/male principle (Taoism)/Yang, opposite: 陰|阴[yin1]
spring (small stream)/mouth of a spring/coin (archaic)
market/city/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Yangquan is a city short of water and mainly depends on karst groundwater in the Niangziguan spring region.
sentences.chinese: 娘子关泉域岩溶地下水是山西省阳泉市的主要水源地。

sentences.english: Yangquan municipal sub-humid warm temperate continental monsoon climate zone.
sentences.chinese: 阳泉市属暧温带半湿润大陆性季风气候区。
